channel.title: googleanalytics on Will Schenk
channel.description: Recent content in googleanalytics on Will Schenk

item.title: Pulling data out of Google Analytics
item.description: I like staring at the real time stats of Google Analytics. As a dashboard, it’s not really as amazing as Chartbeat is, and it doesn’t let you drill down into the data as much as Mixpanel. But GA is super simple to setup and it’s Google, so everyone uses it. Another obsessive/fun thing to do is to see where that spike in inbound traffic is coming from. On HappyFunCorp there are days where we get a sudden influx of Happy Thoughts which warms our hearts and floods our inboxes.
